services.resume: Holds login/session tokens. Sort of like a serverside login cookie.

emails.verified: BOOL, true if verified, false otherwise.

profile.inviteCode: invite code, empty if not valid.
profile.googleLinked: placeholder for google auth, true by default ATM

phones.type: Work, Home, Cell right now, please update this list to keep up to date, use caps for first letter so we can print directly to template
phones.primary: BOOL, true if main phone number used, false otherwise, can only be one main in this array, please verify at code level

User.accountLocked: BOOL, true if locked, otherwise false
